mapper.select: SELECT e.name, e.img, e.how_achieve FROM emblem_achive a, emblem e WHERE a.uid=#{uid} AND e.name = a.emblem_name
mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO emblem_achive (uid, emblem_name) VALUES (#{uid}, #{title})
mapper.update: UPDATE emblem_member SET ${attribute} = CASE WHEN ${attribute} = 1 THEN 0 ELSE ${attribute} - 1 END WHERE uid=#{uid};
